Key.Chinesesimp: 虚拟人工智能系统（配置文件）

Key.English: Enables external Database persistence for Virtual AI
Key.Chinesesimp: 为虚拟AI启用外部数据库持久化

Key.English: Enables sector colouring according to units presence
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据单位存在启用扇区着色

Key.English: Virtualize all editor placed units except synced units
Key.Chinesesimp: 虚拟化除同步单位外的所有编辑器放置单位

Key.English: Sets the distance from players to spawn AI units
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置玩家与AI单位生成的距离

Key.English: Sets the max number of virtualized AI *groups* to spawn at any one time
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置任何时候要生成的虚拟化AI*组*的最大数量

Key.English: If enabled, active zeus entities will spawn virtual groups when in range
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果启用,活动的宙斯实体将在范围内生成虚拟组

Key.English: The radius around player in planes to spawn AI. Set to 0 to disable spawning while in planes
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家在平面上生成AI的半径。设置为0可禁用在平面中生成

Key.English: The radius around player in helicopters to spawn AI. Set to 0 to disable spawning while in helicopters
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家在直升机上生成人工智能的半径。设置为0可在直升机中禁用生成

Key.English: The radius around player controlled UAV to spawn AI. Set to 0 to disable spawning while controlling UAVs. Set to -1 to default to (Infantry) Spawn Radius + 800.
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家控制的无人机周围的半径生产出AI。设置为0禁用生成时控制无人机。设置为-1默认为(步兵)生成半径 + 800.

Key.English: Alters how fast virtual AI move across the map. 0.25 means 25% of a unit's normal speed
Key.Chinesesimp: 改变虚拟AI在地图上移动的速度。25%是指单位正常速度的25%

Key.English: Only one Virtual AI System module can be used
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能使用一个虚拟AI系统模块

Key.English: Toggle debug mode on the profile system
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换配置文件系统上的调试模式

Key.English: Sets the pace of virtual combat. Fastest combat resolves twice as quickly as regular.
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置虚拟战斗的节奏.最快的战斗解决速度是普通战斗的两倍.

Key.English: Sets the range of virtual combat in metres.
Key.Chinesesimp: 以米为单位设置虚拟战斗的范围

Key.English:
Experimental!
This feature is highly experimental and could break missions.
 Please disable if you notice any issues.
Profiles will use intelligent pathing to reach their destinations.
Key.Chinesesimp:
实验的!
这项功能是高度实验性的,可能会破坏任务.
如果发现任何问题,请禁用.
配置文件将使用智能路径到达目的地.

Key.English:
Experimental!
This feature is highly experimental and could break missions.
 Please disable if you notice any issues.
Profiles will use intelligent pathing to reach their destinations.
Key.Chinesesimp:
实验的!
这项功能是高度实验性的,可能会破坏任务.
如果发现任何问题,请禁用.
配置文件将使用智能路径到达目的地.

Key.English: Experimental!\nAdds a boat to a virtual infantry entity that tries to cross water!
Key.Chinesesimp: 实验的!\n将一艘船添加到一个试图穿越水面的虚拟步兵实体!

Key.English: Sleep values between spawning units to not overload engine
Key.Chinesesimp: 生成单位之间的睡眠值不会使引擎过载
